title: Calculator App
description: Calculator App is an application to handle number calculations. This app takes 2 values and manipulate and provides the output.

title: To Do App
description: To Do app is a to do app. Basically it manages the user to do's. User can add and remove and edit,  to do's.

title: Product App
description: Product App is basically an app. Which fetches different kinds of product information and shows a result to user.

title: Weather App
description: Weather App display's a weather of a particular location entered by the user. User can get location based on the zipcode, city name, latitude and lognitude.
